screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 80) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 32 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (720 > wsizex): wsizex = 720 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,32 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2,(720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0,4), size=(250,22), text = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(250,4), size=(100,22), text = 2,flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, backcolor = MultiContentTemplateColor(3)) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130,15), size = (580,60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20,17), size = (60,40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 75 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 80) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 70 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,5), size = (760,30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50,35), size = (720,70), font = 1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 23), gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 110 }

skin.screen: DefaultFormat:%d.%m.%Y {"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10,12), size = (100,75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,10), size = (630,25), font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,40), size = (370,20), font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,70), size = (370,20), font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490,40), size = (255,20), font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490,70), size = (255,20), font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,10), size = (735,28), font=2,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,40), size = (735,50), font=3,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1,color=0x8A8787,color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 100 } # fake entry for dynamic thumbnail resizing, currently there is no other way doing this.
